about.title: Chi siamo
about.subtitle: Chi siamo e cosa stiamo costruendo
about.heroPrimaryCtaAria: Apri il flusso di creazione dei mondi
about.missionBody: Vogliamo rendere accessibili a ogni builder componenti UI di livello mondiale. BroWorld riunisce contributi della community, pattern curati e linee guida inclusive per permettere ai team di spedire più velocemente insieme.

builders.title: Dare potere a ogni builder
builders.body: Offrire impostazioni predefinite ragionate e pattern accessibili per team di qualsiasi dimensione.

community.title: Crescere con la community
community.body: Valorizzare i contributi dei maintainer di tutte le regioni e celebrare la collaborazione aperta.

iteration.title: Iterare con responsabilità
iteration.body: Rilasciare aggiornamenti accuratamente testati con roadmap trasparenti e impatto misurabile.

about.valuesSubtitle: I binari che orientano ogni release e partnership.
about.valuesMediaPlaceholder: Segnaposto per hero o anteprima prodotto. Sostituire con l'asset finale prima del lancio.

community.title: Co-creato con la community
community.body: Gruppi di lavoro moderati condividono le loro sfide così possiamo progettare soluzioni davvero inclusive.

design.title: Attento ai design system
design.body: Ogni componente rispetta token di accessibilità, breakpoint responsive e linee guida sul movimento.

velocity.title: Slancio dall'automazione
velocity.body: Template iniziali e tooling CLI mantengono il ritmo senza compromettere la qualità.

quality.title: Qualità e fiducia di default
quality.body: Revisioni rigorose, suite di regressione visiva e osservabilità garantiscono esperienze resilienti.

about.metricsSubtitle: Segnali dai builder e dalle community che oggi si affidano a BroWorld.

contributors.label: Contributor attivi
contributors.caption: Designer, ingegneri e storyteller che inviano miglioramenti ogni trimestre.

components.label: Primitive componibili
components.caption: Componenti Vue riutilizzabili, composable e flussi iniziali pronti per la produzione.

locales.label: Lingue supportate
locales.caption: Esperienze localizzate con supporto RTL e accessibilità.

satisfaction.label: Indice di soddisfazione
satisfaction.caption: I maintainer riportano che BroWorld aumenta velocità e chiarezza.

about.teamBody: BroWorld è mantenuto da un gruppo distribuito di designer, ingegneri e storyteller che credono che l'open source debba essere piacevole.

amina.bio: Definisce la visione di prodotto e mantiene la roadmap allineata ai bisogni della community.

lukas.bio: Guida l'architettura e garantisce che ogni release sia performante, accessibile e ben testata.

clara.bio: Trasforma i feedback in documentazione azionabile e aiuta i contributor a sentirsi i benvenuti.

youssef.bio: Organizza le sessioni della community, cura i contributi e mantiene conversazioni inclusive.

about.techBody: Ci affidiamo a uno stack Vue moderno per mantenere allineate documentazione e superfici di produzione.

techStack.nuxt: Esperienze con rendering ibrido basate sul routing a file.
techStack.vuetify: Primitive di design accessibili con supporto RTL di prima classe.
techStack.typescript: Scrittura tipizzata in componenti, store e utility.
techStack.vitest: Test rapidi di unità e componenti per release affidabili.

2023.title: Open source del primo set di componenti
2023.description: Pubblicata la base della libreria e la guida di onboarding.

2024.title: Espansione della copertura di localizzazione
2024.description: Aggiunti contenuti multilingua, supporto RTL e flussi di traduzione della community.

2025.title: Lancio dei workflow collaborativi
2025.description: Introdotti template condivisi, cicli di feedback integrati e automazione migliorata.

links.githubAria: Apri il repository GitHub in una nuova scheda
links.docsAria: Leggi la documentazione in una nuova scheda
links.communityAria: Unisciti al forum della community in una nuova scheda

finalCta.title: Costruisci con noi la prossima esperienza BroWorld
finalCta.body: Che tu stia prototipando, scalando le operazioni o guidando nuovi leader della community, siamo pronti a co-progettare il tuo prossimo lancio.
finalCta.mediaPlaceholder: Segnaposto per testimonianza o walkthrough del prodotto.
finalCta.primaryCtaAria: Apri la guida alla creazione del mondo
finalCta.secondaryCtaAria: Apri la pagina contatti per prenotare una conversazione

academy.subtitle: Master the skills to build immersive communities through focused learning tracks.

strategy.title: Experience strategy foundations
strategy.description: Design vision, positioning, and measurement for large-scale experiences.

production.title: Production systems & operations
production.description: Structure teams, rituals, and release pipelines that keep worlds shipping.

leadership.title: Leadership & community stewardship
leadership.description: Grow inclusive leadership habits and mentor distributed creator teams.

simulation.title: Launch simulation
simulation.resources: Live ops dashboard, mentor office hours

coaching.name: Certified Bro World Coach
coaching.requirements: Complete coaching residency & pass live assessment

facilitation.name: Community Facilitation Specialist
facilitation.requirements: Finish facilitation labs & submit workshop recordings

process.title: How the academy works
process.description: A guided journey mixing live instruction, practice, and validation.

intake.title: Intake & goals
intake.description: Set ambitions, map competencies, and match with mentors.

immersion.title: Immersive learning
immersion.description: Attend live sessions, async lessons, and collaborative studios.

practice.title: Guided practice
practice.description: Apply frameworks to real projects with iterative feedback.

assessment.title: Assessment & recognition
assessment.description: Showcase outcomes and earn credentials backed by experts.

profile.title: Profilo
profile.subtitle: Rivedi e gestisci le tue informazioni personali.

calendar.subtitle: Tieni sotto controllo gli impegni in arrivo.

profileFriends.title: Connessioni
profileFriends.subtitle: Riconnettiti con collaboratori, mentori e community.

highlights.title: Collaboratori in evidenza

profileFriends.empty: Nessun profilo corrisponde ancora a questo filtro.

profilePhotos.title: Libreria foto
profilePhotos.subtitle: Cura gli highlight di lanci, viaggi di ricerca e momenti dietro le quinte.

sections.notesDescription: Aggiornamenti dei collaboratori mentre preparano storie visive.

timeline.title: Pietre miliari della storia
timeline.description: Scatti dei lanci, delle residenze e dei ritiri che hanno segnato il tuo anno.

cta.share: Condividi questi set curati con il tuo team o esportali nelle presentazioni.

feedback.shareCollection: Le opzioni di condivisione sono pronte.

profilePhotos.empty: Nessuna foto corrisponde a questo filtro al momento.

profileEdit.title: Modifica profilo
profileEdit.subtitle: Aggiorna i tuoi dati così i collaboratori hanno sempre il contesto giusto.

helpers.bio: Condividi la tua missione, il tuo modo di collaborare o i successi recenti (280 caratteri).
helpers.skills: Digita per aggiungere competenze personalizzate o scegli tra i suggerimenti.
helpers.summary: Questa scheda rapida si aggiorna automaticamente mentre modifichi i tuoi dati.
helpers.siteSettings: Aggiorna nome o slogan del sito senza lasciare il profilo.

feedback.successMessage: I dettagli del profilo sono stati salvati con successo.

validation.bioLimit: La biografia deve contenere al massimo 280 caratteri.

profileSecurity.title: Password e sicurezza
profileSecurity.subtitle: Proteggi il tuo account con credenziali robuste e dispositivi verificati.

password.title: Aggiorna password
password.description: Crea una passphrase unica con almeno 12 caratteri, numeri e simboli.

sessions.title: Sessioni attive
sessions.description: Controlla dove hai effettuato l’accesso e revoca l’accesso ai dispositivi sconosciuti.

mfa.title: Autenticazione a due fattori
mfa.description: Aggiungi un ulteriore passaggio di verifica per mettere al sicuro il tuo workspace.

passwordHint.title: Suggerimenti sulla password
passwordHint.description: Usa un password manager, evita i duplicati e aggiorna regolarmente le credenziali sensibili.

recoveryCodes.title: Conserva questi codici di recupero monouso

ui.title: UI Component Playground
ui.description: Review every base component with multiple variants, sizes, and accessibility states.

hints.radio: Choose the plan that fits best.

notes.autofocus: Auto-focus is applied to show the focus style.
notes.disabledChoice: One option is disabled to demonstrate aria-disabled.

sample.multiline: Let the team know how this feels.
sample.longerText: This textarea grows as you type so reviewers can stress-test the auto-grow behaviour.

buttons.title: Buttons
buttons.description: Primary actions and secondary button styles.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: Text inputs and textareas with validation states.

toggles.title: Toggles

selectors.title: Selectors
selectors.description: Select menus and radio groups for choosing options.

wrappers.title: Form wrappers
wrappers.description: FormField wrapper integrating labels, hints, and errors.

sections.buttonVariantsDescription: Each button variant rendered across small, medium, and large sizes.
sections.buttonStatesDescription: Loading, disabled, icon, and block button examples.
sections.inputTypesDescription: BaseInput with different HTML input types and clearable behaviour.
sections.inputStatesDescription: Focused, success, error, and disabled input states.
sections.textareaStatesDescription: Resizable textarea variations with hints and disabled view.
sections.checkboxesDescription: Checked, indeterminate, and disabled checkbox states.
sections.selectsDescription: Single, multi-select, and disabled options examples.
sections.radiosDescription: Vertical and horizontal radio group layouts with keyboard support.
sections.formFieldsDescription: Composable wrapper showing labels, hints, errors, and nested controls.

createWorld.title: Create a new world
createWorld.subtitle: Assemble the foundation, governance, and live experiences your community needs—all in one guided workspace.

form.title: World blueprint
form.subtitle: Define the identity, launch plan, and access controls before inviting your first residents.

basicInfo.title: Core details
basicInfo.subtitle: Give your world a clear identity so members instantly understand where they are.

fields.name: World name
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the story, purpose, and experiences players can expect.
fields.visibilityHint: Choose whether your world is listed in the public explorer or invitation only.
fields.regionHint: Helps us route latency-optimised infrastructure for your players.
fields.launchDateHint: Share your planned go-live to coordinate testing windows and announcements.
fields.tagsHint: Use up to five tags to help members find the right activities.
fields.guidelinesPlaceholder: Outline tone, expectations, and escalation policies for everyone who joins.

advanced.title: Advanced controls
advanced.subtitle: Fine-tune monetisation, integrations, and access policies.
advanced.guestsHint: Guests can browse without creating an account but cannot interact.

plugins.title: Curate your plugin stack
plugins.subtitle: Mix social, economic, and safety plugins to craft the experience your community deserves.

community.title: Community presence
community.description: Welcome members, broadcast announcements, and host social spaces.

lobby.name: Interactive lobby
lobby.description: Guide newcomers with custom zones, featured posts, and smart onboarding.
points: Build modular landing rooms with drag-and-drop widgets.
Highlight trending events, moderators, and creator spotlights.
Schedule dynamic greetings that adapt to time zones.

events.name: Event orchestration
events.description: Plan tournaments, premieres, and collaborative quests with automated reminders.
points: Coordinate multi-stage brackets and RSVPs in one dashboard.
Sync calendars, ticketing, and broadcast overlays automatically.
Unlock post-event recaps with stats, clips, and rewards.

streams.name: Creator streams
streams.description: Embed live streams, watch parties, and backstage chats without leaving your world.
points: Support multi-platform streaming with adaptive quality.
Unlock co-streaming rooms for community commentators.
Capture highlights and publish recap reels instantly.

economy.title: Economy & progression
economy.description: Design progression loops, trading systems, and reward paths tailored to your world.

market.name: Marketplace hub
market.description: Launch safe trading for cosmetics, crafting materials, and time-limited drops.
points: List items with rarity, seasonality, and bundle options.
Protect transactions with escrow, tax, and fraud tooling.
Publish merchandising campaigns with dynamic pricing rules.

crafting.name: Crafting simulator
crafting.description: Author recipes, resource nodes, and crafting stations with live balancing.
points: Define ingredient trees and skill requirements visually.
Simulate yield, cooldowns, and fail states before release.
Link crafting outputs to quests, vendors, or marketplace listings.

rewards.name: Rewards engine
rewards.description: Reward cohorts with quests, achievements, and season passes.
points: Segment milestones by player type, region, or platform.
Automate reward delivery with fraud-safe claims.
Track redemption analytics and churn risk in real time.

governance.title: Governance & safety
governance.description: Empower trusted teams with moderation, safety, and insight workflows.

moderation.name: Moderation console
moderation.description: Resolve reports, escalations, and appeals with collaborative tooling.
points: Route cases automatically by severity and language.
Surface evidence timelines with chat, clips, and audit logs.
Assign playbooks, sanctions, and cooldown windows in context.

safety.name: Safety automation
safety.description: Detect toxicity, spam, and suspicious behaviour before it spreads.
points: Deploy ML classifiers tuned for your community norms.
Set up adaptive rate limits and content filters.
Notify guardians and caretakers with role-based alerts.

analytics.name: Governance analytics
analytics.description: Measure health, retention, and policy impact across every world surface.
points: Monitor safety KPIs with real-time dashboards.
Correlate moderation actions with engagement outcomes.
Export compliance-ready reports for stakeholders.

workflow.title: Launch with confidence
workflow.subtitle: Follow a proven cadence from vision to expansion.

vision.title: Shape your vision
vision.description: Align on pillars, tone, and success metrics with stakeholders and creators.

launch.title: Launch with momentum
launch.description: Coordinate marketing beats, early access waves, and go-live checklists.

expand.title: Expand sustainably
expand.description: Iterate on feedback, scale to new regions, and grow ambassador programmes.

cta.title: Need a hand activating your world?
cta.description: Our team can help you architect governance models, migration plans, and live operations tailored to your audience.

job.title: Jobs
job.subtitle: Centralise every step of your recruiting funnel to move from sourcing to signing with clarity.

matching.title: Spot the right talent faster
matching.description: Aggregate sourcing activity and prioritise applicants automatically.
points: Sync job boards, referrals, and internal mobility into one view.
Score applications with configurable criteria and bias safeguards.
Highlight talent pools ready for nurture or re-engagement.

automation.title: Automate team coordination
automation.description: Give recruiters, interviewers, and hiring managers a shared command centre.
points: Trigger interview kits and reminders in the right timezone.
Share structured feedback templates that surface signal over noise.
Notify stakeholders the moment a candidate advances or stalls.

insights.title: Measure hiring impact
insights.description: Understand conversion, velocity, and quality without exporting spreadsheets.
points: Track time-to-fill, diversity ratios, and offer acceptance in real time.
Visualise bottlenecks across regions or job families instantly.
Share live dashboards with leadership and partners securely.

publish.title: Publish with confidence
publish.description: Launch branded job pages and syndicated listings with reusable templates.

review.title: Review together
review.description: Collaborate on feedback, calibrate scorecards, and keep the loop accountable.

hire.title: Hire and onboard
hire.description: Secure approvals, generate offers, and pass context to onboarding seamlessly.

cta.title: Design a hiring experience candidates love
cta.description: Let our team help you tailor BroWorld to your recruitment stack, processes, and compliance needs.

openings.title: Current openings
openings.subtitle: Explore the roles we're actively hiring for and get a feel for the work you'll lead from day one.

productDesigner.title: Senior Product Designer
productDesigner.description: Shape multi-platform experiences for recruiters and candidates across web and mobile.

apply.label: Apply now
apply.aria: Apply to the Senior Product Designer role

aiRecruiter.title: AI Recruiter Strategist
aiRecruiter.description: Build AI copilots that automate sourcing, screening, and scheduling flows.

apply.label: Apply now
apply.aria: Apply to the AI Recruiter Strategist role

salesLead.title: Enterprise Sales Lead
salesLead.description: Lead pipeline generation and coach AEs through complex enterprise deals.

apply.label: Apply now
apply.aria: Apply to the Enterprise Sales Lead role

customerSuccess.title: Customer Success Partner
customerSuccess.description: Guide talent teams as they onboard, launch workflows, and measure adoption.

apply.label: Apply now
apply.aria: Apply to the Customer Success Partner role

application.title: Submit your application
application.subtitle: Share a few details and our talent team will reach out with next steps.
highlights: A tailored walkthrough of BroWorld based on your hiring maturity.
Introductions to the team members you'll collaborate with.
A response within two business days—even if we are not moving forward yet.

form.messagePlaceholder: Share recent projects, achievements, or what excites you about BroWorld.

form.success: Thank you! Our talent team will review your profile and be in touch shortly.

rules.consent: Please confirm we can contact you.

game.title: Arena quiz
game.subtitle: Prototipa quiz a più step con categorie, livelli e classifica live.

menu.helper: Scegli una categoria e un livello per avviare il quiz. Accedi per sincronizzare i risultati.

categories.title: Scegli una categoria
categories.subtitle: Esplora banche di domande ambientate nell'universo Bro World.

levels.title: Seleziona un livello

levels.locked: Seleziona prima una categoria per visualizzare i livelli.
levels.empty: Nessun livello disponibile per questa categoria.

auth.title: Accedi per salvare i tuoi progressi

validation.range: La fine dell'evento deve essere successiva all'inizio.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce
ecommerce.subtitle: Craft immersive storefronts, orchestrate fulfilment, and personalise campaigns across every channel.

catalog.title: Unify your catalogue
catalog.description: Manage product variants, rich storytelling, and merchandising in one workspace.
points: Support digital, physical, and subscription products side by side.
Optimise imagery, copy, and translations with collaborative reviews.
Launch curated collections with scheduling and inventory safeguards.

checkout.title: Delight at checkout
checkout.description: Reduce friction with fast, accessible, and trusted purchase flows.
points: Offer local payments, wallets, and instalments without custom code.
Embed fraud checks, taxes, and duties that scale globally.
Give support teams live context to resolve orders instantly.

marketing.title: Personalise every campaign
marketing.description: Coordinate lifecycle messaging, loyalty, and analytics together.
points: Segment audiences with zero-party and behavioural data respectfully.
Trigger automations tied to launches, restocks, and VIP moments.
Attribute revenue accurately with multi-touch insights.

launch.title: Launch
launch.description: Prototype storefronts, test merchandising, and go live confidently.

optimize.title: Optimise
optimize.description: Iterate on conversion, retention, and operations with actionable insights.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Expand to new regions, channels, and partnerships with built-in governance.

cta.title: Transform your retail roadmap
cta.description: Explore how BroWorld adapts to your commerce stack, fulfilment partners, and customer promises.

education.title: Istruzione
education.subtitle: Offri a docenti, studenti e amministratori esperienze collaborative guidate dai dati.

curriculum.title: Progetta curricula inclusivi
curriculum.description: Crea corsi, percorsi di microlearning e programmi di certificazione con facilità.
points: Riutilizza modelli che bilanciano apprendimento sincrono e asincrono.
Integra automaticamente multimedia, verifiche e standard di accessibilità.
Localizza i contenuti per le coorti nei diversi campus o regioni.

collaboration.title: Promuovi la collaborazione
collaboration.description: Metti in contatto docenti, mentori e pari all'interno di un campus digitale sicuro.
points: Coordina mentoring, ricevimento studenti e forum di coorte senza sforzo.
Offri cicli di feedback in tempo reale su compiti e progetti.
Celebra i progressi con badge, spotlight e percorsi alumni.

analytics.title: Agisci su analisi significative
analytics.description: Metti in evidenza insight che supportano obiettivi di retention, benessere e accreditamento.
points: Monitora i segnali di coinvolgimento per intervenire prima che gli studenti si allontanino.
Condividi dashboard di programma con la dirigenza e gli enti di accreditamento.
Tutela la privacy con controlli e governance trasparenti.

design.title: Progettare
design.description: Mappa insieme risultati di apprendimento, contenuti e momenti di valutazione.

deliver.title: Erogare
deliver.description: Offri sessioni live e on-demand, traccia la partecipazione e adatta in tempo reale.

reflect.title: Riflettere
reflect.description: Valuta l'impatto, raccogli feedback e migliora per il prossimo intake.

cta.title: Valorizza il tuo ecosistema di apprendimento
cta.description: Collabora con noi per modernizzare programmi, servizi agli studenti ed esperienze alumni.

catalog.title: Esplora i percorsi di apprendimento
catalog.subtitle: Scopri categorie curate, segui lezioni interattive e sblocca un certificato dimostrativo superando il quiz finale.

course.quizDescription: Rispondi a dieci domande per convalidare le tue conoscenze e ottenere il certificato del corso.

quiz.title: Quiz finale — {course}
quiz.subtitle: Rispondi a tutte le domande. Ottieni almeno il 70 % per sbloccare il certificato.
quiz.certificateDescription: Aggiungi il tuo nome e scarica un PDF condivisibile rilasciato da questo ambiente demo.
quiz.retryDescription: Rivedi le lezioni e ripeti il quiz quando ti senti pronto.

certificate.title: Certificato di completamento
certificate.subtitle: Questo documento celebra il completamento con successo di un corso dimostrativo.

quiz.title: Quiz experiences
quiz.subtitle: Prototype adaptive quizzes that energise your community with instant feedback and storytelling.

overview.title: Quiz performance snapshot
overview.description: Monitor participation, completion, and satisfaction to keep every cohort motivated.

participants.title: Active participants
participants.caption: Joined at least one quiz session this week.

completion.title: Average completion
completion.caption: Finished all rounds with a passing score.

authoring.title: Author in minutes
authoring.description: Draft polished quizzes with assisted prompts, templates, and reusable scoring rules.
points: Convert brainstorm notes into question pools automatically.
Mix formats like multiple choice, polls, and lightning rounds.
Reuse timers, scoring weights, and bonus rules across series.

engagement.title: Fuel real-time engagement
engagement.description: Turn every round into a show with live reactions, audio intros, and streak multipliers.
points: Highlight hosts and co-creators with stage-ready layouts.
Trigger soundscapes and emotes when milestones are unlocked.
Support breakout teams, rematches, and collaborative lifelines.

analytics.title: Measure what matters
analytics.description: Track sentiment, pacing, and knowledge gaps for every cohort in one dashboard.
points: Compare performance by role, location, or membership tier.
Spot drop-off moments with second-by-second completion curves.
Export highlights, clips, and insights for stakeholders.

plan.title: Plan your storyline
plan.description: Align on themes, desired outcomes, and player journeys before drafting questions.

launch.title: Launch the experience
launch.description: Stream the quiz with live moderation, automated scoring, and instant feedback loops.

iterate.title: Iterate with insights
iterate.description: Analyse results, remix question banks, and refresh the experience for the next cohort.

questionBanks.title: Curated question banks
questionBanks.description: Mix ready-to-run categories with your own questions to keep every round feeling fresh.

general.title: General knowledge vault
general.description: A rotating mix of culture, science, and newsworthy trivia for broad audiences.

product.title: Product mastery set
product.description: Train advocates and sales teams on features, roadmaps, and objection handling.

community.title: Community culture pack
community.description: Celebrate inside jokes, rituals, and lore from your most dedicated members.

leaderboard.title: Community leaderboard
leaderboard.description: Celebrate champions and spark friendly rivalries with transparent scoring.

cta.title: Launch your next quiz series
cta.description: Partner with us to craft immersive assessments for teams, classrooms, and fandoms.

performance.title: Istante della qualità dell'esperienza
performance.subtitle: Uno sguardo mirato a come rende il feed principale su dispositivi reali.

metrics.title: Metriche chiave dell'esperienza
metrics.subtitle: Basato su esecuzioni Lighthouse mobile (Moto G Power emulato).

fcp.label: First Contentful Paint
fcp.description: I primi pixel significativi appaiono in meno di un secondo.

lcp.label: Largest Contentful Paint
lcp.description: Il media hero si carica dopo lo scheletro ma resta nei limiti dei Web Vitals.
lcp.trend: Ottimizza precaricando lo sprite dell'immagine in evidenza.

tbt.label: Total Blocking Time
tbt.description: Le attività lunghe durante l'hydration impegnano il thread.
tbt.trend: Causato dal caricamento anticipato di widget opzionali.

speedIndex.label: Speed Index
speedIndex.description: La completezza visiva è accettabile ma può migliorare.
speedIndex.trend: Beneficia molto dalla consegna prioritaria del CSS.

cls.label: Cumulative Layout Shift
cls.description: Card e rail delle storie si spostano quando arrivano contenuti tardivi.
cls.trend: Ancorare i media con rapporti d'aspetto fissi per stabilizzare il feed.

opportunities.title: Opportunità ad alto impatto
opportunities.subtitle: Correzioni prioritarie per affrontare prima le metriche in rosso.

layout.title: Stabilizzare spazi media e widget
layout.description: Riservare spazio a banner, caroselli e annunci dinamici.
layout.action: Usare rapporti d'aspetto intrinseci e altezze degli scheletri per gli elementi del feed.

script.title: Rinviare gli script non critici
script.description: Separare analisi, reazioni e pannelli di messaggistica dal bundle principale.
script.action: Idratare i widget opzionali all'interazione usando `defineAsyncComponent`.

assets.title: Ottimizzare le immagini hero
assets.description: Comprimere il collage principale e servire sorgenti AVIF di default.
assets.action: Precaricare la prima immagine del feed e caricare in differita le altre.

monitoring.title: Ampliare la copertura dei Core Web Vitals
monitoring.description: Suddividere le metriche per percorso e fascia di dispositivo.
monitoring.action: Inviare i segnali `web-vitals` al data lake analitico per monitorare le regressioni.

timeline.title: Cronologia di miglioramento
timeline.subtitle: Un rollout realistico per distribuire e verificare le correzioni.

week1.title: Eliminare gli spostamenti di layout
week1.description: Verificare tutte le card e le storie per dimensioni determinate.
actions: Aggiungere rapporti d'aspetto a miniature e illustrazioni dei post.
Bloccare i contenitori pubblicitari dietro segnaposto scheletrici.

week2.title: Spezzare le attività lunghe
week2.description: Spostare la logica opzionale in callback inattivi e confini asincroni.
actions: Suddividere il cassetto della messaggistica e il vassoio delle reazioni.
Usare `requestIdleCallback` prima di avviare gli SDK di analisi.

week3.title: Verificare i miglioramenti con il RUM
week3.description: Estendere il reporting Core Web Vitals alle coorti in produzione.
actions: Inviare le metriche al lago di monitoraggio con i metadati di build.
Allertare su regressioni LCP/TBT superiori al 10% settimana su settimana.
